#summary Changes in current whatswrong version
#labels Featured

== Version 0.0.4 ==

=== New Features === 
  * new feature: tokens can be removed from the graph using a filter that tests whether token properties contain (or equal) certain strings.
  * new feature: remove all tokens that don't have an edge
  * changed lucene analyzer to !WhitespaceAnalyzer -> now searching for "role:R-AA" does break up the "R-AA" to find things with "A" in it.
  * gold and guess loader now remember their directory from previous session
